faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our image transformation tool

q1.question: How to make an image flip on iPhone?
q1.answer: Go to the App Store and download our iOS app to flip your phone images. Upload your image, then select it. On the toolbar, click Flip (arrow circling back icon). Click Flip horizontal or Flip vertical. Once done, tap outside the layout to hide the toolbar and save your flipped image. That's it; no hidden controls or secret keyboard shortcuts necessary with our convenient app.

q2.question: How to mirror or flip an image on Android?
q2.answer: Head over to Google Play and download our Android app to flip your phone images. Upload your image then tap on it; a white border should appear around the image to indicate it has been selected. On the bottom toolbar, click Flip then choose between Flip horizontal or Flip vertical. With our free image flip tool, you've got everything you need in a simple, intuitive interface.

q3.question: When would you need to flip an image?
q3.answer: Flipping an image can be a great way to get a photo to look the way you want it. An image mirror flip can have added symmetry or improved orientation, making it better-looking than the original. Furthermore, our eyes are often drawn from left to right when looking at a photo. Flipping an image can adjust the direction and create a momentum that feels natural and easy.

q4.question: What image formats are supported?
q4.answer: Our tool supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats. These are the most common image formats used on the web and provide excellent quality. All formats maintain perfect quality during processing.

q5.question: Is there a file size limit?
q5.answer: Yes, the maximum file size is 50MB per image. This limit ensures fast processing while accommodating most high-resolution photos. For larger files, consider compressing your image first.

q6.question: Is my image data safe and private?
q6.answer: Absolutely! All image processing happens directly in your browser using advanced web technologies. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security. We don't store or have access to any of your images.

q7.question: Is this image flipper free to use?
q7.answer: Yes! Our image flipper is completely free to use with no hidden fees or subscription required. You can flip, rotate, and download unlimited images without any watermarks or restrictions.

q8.question: Can I use this as an image mirror tool?
q8.answer: Absolutely! Our tool works perfectly as an image mirror flipper. Simply upload your image and use the horizontal flip option to create a perfect mirror effect of your photo.

q9.question: How do I flip an image 90 degrees?
q9.answer: To flip an image 90 degrees, upload your photo and select the 90° rotation option from our rotation controls. You can rotate clockwise or counter-clockwise to achieve the perfect orientation.

q10.question: How to flip an image on computer?
q10.answer: Our web-based image flipper works directly in your browser - no software installation needed! Just visit our website, upload your image, apply the flip or rotation you want, and download the result. It works on any computer with a web browser.
